00042 using namespace std;
00043 using stor::HLTInfo;
00044 
00045 namespace {
00046   string getFileContents(const string& conffile)
00047   {
00048     struct stat b;
00049     if(stat(conffile.c_str(),&b)<0)
00050       {
00051   cerr << "Cannot stat() file " << conffile << endl;
00052   abort();
00053       }
00054     
00055     fstream ist(conffile.c_str());
00056     if(!ist)
00057       {
00058   cerr << "Could not open file " << conffile << endl;
00059   abort();
00060       }
00061     
00062     string rc(b.st_size,' ');
00063     ist.getline(&rc[0],b.st_size,fstream::traits_type::eof());
00064     return rc;
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 static void deleteBuffer(void* v)
00069 {
00070   stor::FragEntry* fe = (stor::FragEntry*)v;
00071   delete [] (char*)fe->buffer_address_;
00072 }

00074 // -----------------------------------------------
00075 
00076 class Main
00077 {
00078  public:
00079   Main(const string& conffile, const vector<string>& file_names);
00080   ~Main();
00081   
00082   int run();
00083 
00084  private:
00085 
00086   // disallow the following
00087   Main(const Main& m);
00088   Main& operator=(const Main&) { return *this; }
00089 
00090   vector<string> names_;
00091   edm::ProductRegistry prods_;
00092   stor::EPRunner drain_;
00093   boost::shared_ptr<stor::FragmentCollector> coll_;
00094   typedef boost::shared_ptr<edmtestp::TestFileReader> ReaderPtr;
00095   typedef vector<ReaderPtr> Readers;
00096   Readers readers_;
00097   log4cplus::Logger logger_;
00098 };
00099 
00100 // ----------- implementation --------------
00101 
00102 
00103 Main::~Main() { }
00104 
00105 
00106 Main::Main(const string& conffile, const vector<string>& file_names):
00107   names_(file_names),
00108   prods_(edm::getRegFromFile(file_names[0])),
00109   drain_(getFileContents(conffile),auto_ptr<HLTInfo>(new HLTInfo(prods_))),
00110   logger_(log4cplus::Logger::getRoot())  // placeholder, overwritten below
00111 {
00112   cout << "ctor of Main" << endl;
00113 
00114   log4cplus::BasicConfigurator config;
00115   config.configure();
00116   logger_ = log4cplus::Logger::getInstance("main");
00117 
00118   coll_.reset(new stor::FragmentCollector(*drain_.getInfo(),deleteBuffer,
00119                                           logger_,conffile));
00120 
00121   boost::shared_ptr<stor::InitMsgCollection>
00122     initMsgCollection(new stor::InitMsgCollection());
00123   coll_->setInitMsgCollection(initMsgCollection);
00124 
00125   boost::shared_ptr<stor::Parameter> smParameter =
00126     stor::Configurator::instance()->getParameter();
00127   // the following directory path must have "open", "closed", and
00128   // "log" subdirectories!
00129   smParameter->setfilePath("/tmp/biery");
00130 
00131   // jbk - the next line should not be needed
00132   // edm::declareStreamers(prods_);
00133   vector<string>::iterator it(names_.begin()),en(names_.end());
00134   for(;it!=en;++it)
00135     {
00136       ReaderPtr p(new edmtestp::TestFileReader(*it,
00137                  drain_.getInfo()->getFragmentQueue(),
00138                  prods_));
00139       readers_.push_back(p);
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 int Main::run()
00144 {
00145   cout << "starting the EP" << endl;
00146   drain_.start();
00147   coll_->start();
00148 
00149   cout << "started the EP" << endl;
00150   // sleep(10);
00151 
00152   // start file readers
00153   Readers::iterator it(readers_.begin()),en(readers_.end());
00154   for(;it!=en;++it)
00155     {
00156       (*it)->start();
00157     }
00158   // wait for all file readers to complete
00159   for(it=readers_.begin();it!=en;++it)
00160     {
00161       (*it)->join();
00162     }
00163 
00164   // send done to the drain
00165   edm::EventBuffer::ProducerBuffer b(coll_->getFragmentQueue());
00166   b.commit();
00167 
00168   coll_->join();
00169   drain_.join();
00170   return 0;
00171 }
00172 
00173 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00174 {
00175   // pull options out of command line
00176   if(argc < 3)
00177     {
00178       cout << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " "
00179      << "config_file inpfile1 inpfile2 ... inpfileN"
00180      << endl;
00181       return 0;
00182       //throw cms::Exception("config") << "Bad command line arguments\n";
00183     }
00184 
00185   edm::service::MessageServicePresence theMessageServicePresence;
00186   edmplugin::PluginManager::configure(edmplugin::standard::config());
00187   string conffile(argv[1]);
00188   
00189   vector<string> file_names;
00190   
00191   for(int i=2;i<argc;++i)
00192     {
00193       cout << argv[i] << endl;
00194       file_names.push_back(argv[i]);
00195     }
00196   
00197   try {
00198     edm::loadExtraClasses();
00199     cout << "Done loading extra classes" << endl;
00200     Main m(conffile,file_names);
00201     m.run();
00202   }
00203   catch(cms::Exception& e)
00204     {
00205       cerr << "Caught an exception:\n" << e.what() << endl;
00206       throw;
00207     }
00208   catch(std::exception& e)
00209     {
00210       cerr << "Caught an exception:\n" << e.what() << endl;
00211       throw;
00212     }
00213   catch(...)
00214   {
00215       cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n" << endl;
00216   }
00217 
00218   cout << "Main is done!" << endl;
00219   return 0;
00220 }
